@samoned55- you need to flash your drive to the new firmware.  I myself am going to let the new firmware get used for a while before I flash my drive with it.  I'm sure c4e did a fine job testing it but its new and you never know if they thought of everything when they tested it.  Going to wait to see if any issues arise.
